title: When is added sandbox? (sry for bad english)

replies.body: they're still testing it on the pbe and they don't plan to release it until they're sure its largely bug free and has the basic features it needs. soo itll just depend

I don't have any information on the practice tool  right now beyond our [how-to guide](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/practice-purpose) a few days ago.   Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/)  page as we draw closer.  Hang tight!
